summary: NOTHING HAS HAPPENED YET!.  THIS CAR IS NOT SAFE TO DRIVE AND THEY HAVE KNOWN ABOUT IT AND WILL NOT GET THE PART TO FIX IT.  HOW HARD COULD IT BE TO MAKE THE PART, APPARENTLY NO ONE IS MAKING IT OR IT WOULD HAVE BEEN DONE.  I RECEIVED THIS RECALL LETTER MONTHS AGO OF COURSE THEY DIDN'T DATE IT SO I'M NOT SURE HOW LONG IT HAS BEEN. HOW CAN A COMPANY THIS BIG GET AWAY WITH NOT FIXING THE PROBLEM?
